entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:33 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:33 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
